COMMAND.NAME: settopleft
COMMAND.PARAMETER: windowName The name of the e93 window this command will act upon.

DESCRIPTION.P: Set the line number to display at the top of windowName and the number of pixels from the left that windowName should display.
NOTE: if any value is out of range, it will be set to the nearest allowable value.

COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
windowName is not provided.
windowName is not an e93 window.
